name: Icecream Runner
description:
You have an icecream for your girlfriend, but you need to get to her before it melts.

Answer quiz-questions along the way for extra style points.

Controls:
WASD for movement
Mouse to look around
1, 2, and 3 to select answers

This submission was a team effort, though sadly not everyone could contribute as much time or motivation as hoped.

Made using Godot, Blender and LMMS.

Uses the Vegur font (https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/vegur#Vegur-Bold) and MuseScore's sound font.
